items.sentence: I'm not sure that you'll be able to reach Tom.
Do you remember where we first met each other?
Tom couldn't see who was standing behind Mary.
Tom doesn't live very far from where he works.
It's times like these that I just want to cry.
Tom came out of the principal's office crying.
Tom looked at his dead dog and started crying.
I was afraid something like that would happen.
It wasn't immediately clear what had happened.
Have you ever wished you were a better person?
Tom's hair is the same color as his dog's fur.
Do you really think that Tom will be deported?
Tom spent Christmas in Boston with his family.
Tom is one of the most gullible people I know.
Tom was so busy working that he forgot to eat.
Tom read a magazine while waiting for the bus.
That was a question that Tom seemed ready for.
Tom wanted Mary to come to his birthday party.
I think that you're asking the wrong question.
I haven't given much thought to that question.
